caption: Identity Analysis Finding
description:
This finding represents an identity analysis result, which evaluates IAM policies, external access patterns, and IAM configurations of resources for potential security risks.
Note: If the event producer is a security control, the security_control profile should be applied and its attacks information, if present, should be duplicated into the finding_info object.
Note: If the Finding is an incident, i.e. requires incident workflow, also apply the incident profile or aggregate this finding into an Incident Finding.
name: identity_analysis_finding

applications.description: Describes details about the application(s) that the identity may have access to.

external_access_analysis.description: Describes results of analysis performed to determine external access to the resource that is the subject of the analysis.

resources.description: Describes identifiers, type, and other high level details about the resources, that the identity may have access to.

user.description: Describes specific details about the Identity that is the subject of the analysis.
